mapper.select: SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre, Users where Sale.userNo = Users.userNo AND Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo ORDER BY saleNo desc

SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, author, regiDate, state, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre where Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND saleNo = #{saleNo}

SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre, Users where Sale.userNo = Users.userNo AND Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND title like '%'|| #{title} ||'%' ORDER BY saleNo desc

SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, userNo, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre where Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND genreType like '%'|| #{genreType} ||'%' ORDER BY saleNo desc
mapper.insert: Insert into Sale (saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, userNo, author, genreNo) Values (#{saleNo}, #{publisher}, #{title}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{image}, #{info}, 1, #{author}, #{genre.genreNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE Sale SET salePrice = #{salePrice}, image = #{image}, info = #{info} WHERE saleNo = #{saleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre, Users where Sale.userNo = Users.userNo AND Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND Users.userNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY saleNo desc
SELECT salePrice FROM Sale WHERE saleNo = #{saleNo}
